meaning_str.bing:
v. 祈祷；祷告；恳求；乞求
adv. 请；〈旧〉请问
网络. 祈求；请求

祈祷；祷告；恳求；请求；（法律）请求判决
请（礼貌地请求或询问）；恳请（表达强烈的请求）；祈求

1.en: Because your friendship means so much, I pray that you and I will always somehow keep in touch as days and years go by.
1.cn: 因为你的友谊如此重要，我只想对你说，不管岁月怎样流逝，你与我一定要设法保持联系。

2.en: Israel - Pray that the hearts of Jews would be opened to see Jesus as their personal Savior and the fulfillment of their Jewish heritage.
2.cn: 以色列—祷告犹太人的心被打开，能看见耶稣是他们个人的救主，是他们犹太人的产业的实现。

3.en: To pray for her in your heart, let the happiness with her forever .
3.cn: 为她祈祷在心田，希望幸福永远与她伴…

0.en: So, why don't we begin? Let us pray.
0.cn: 不如我们开始吧，我们先祈祷。

1.en: Why don't you ask the reverend to pray on it?

2.en: Hey, Miguel, pray for me, okay? All right, man. Yeah.
2.cn: 米格尔，为我祈祷吧？好吧，伙计。好。

3.en: Now, we must pray they are enough. I won't let anything happen to her.
3.cn: 现在我们得祈祷她的能力足够强大了。我不会让她出事的。

4.en: Nothing. I pray he is alive, but, if he is, I won't say a thing.
4.cn: 我什么也不会说，我祈祷他平安，如果他真回来了，我什么也不会说。

5.en: Plead guilty. Put yourself at the mercy of the court. Maybe they'll let you go home and pray.
5.cn: 认罪。为自己争取法庭怜悯，也许他们会让你回家祈祷。

6.en: Our Autobot space craft has the ability to get there. And, you must pray it's in time.
6.cn: 我们汽车人的宇宙飞船可以到达那里，而你们只能祈祷这还来得及。

7.en: So a hundred surgeries later, he looks at his mom and says, "Mom, please pray for me. I'm in so much pain."
7.cn: 在经历了无数手术后，他看着妈妈说“妈妈，为我祈祷吧，我十分痛苦”。

8.en: I don't like food. I love it. If I don't love it, I don't swallow. I will return tomorrow night with high expectations. Pray you don't disappoint me.
8.cn: 我不只爱好美食，我热爱美食，如果我不热爱，就根本吞不下肚。明晚我会满怀期待回到这里。向天祈祷吧! 你最好别让我失望。

9.en: I understand that and I totally respect you. I just, I don't pray to Ra, so…
9.cn: 这我理解，我完全敬重你。但我信奉的不是拉，所以……

10.en: Surely, when you close your eyes at night, you pray for a man of noble character.
10.cn: 当然，晚上闭上眼睛的时候会祈求一位高尚男子的到来。

11.en: To give my future husband many sons, that is all I pray for. We shall talk much, Princess.
11.cn: 我只祈求，能为将来的夫君诞下许多子嗣。我们应该多聊聊，公主。

12.en: You got to sit and think and pray about everything. Look at you. You're doing it right now.
12.cn: 你得坐下思考凡事祷告。看看你，你现在就想想。

13.en: Upon my word, you give your opinion very decidedly for so young a person. Pray, what is your age?
13.cn: 真想不到，你这么小的一个人倒有这样的主见。请问，你几岁啦？

14.en: I mean, Sacajawea, she honors her spiritual ancestors, and you pray to some sort of goat god, Attila, right?
14.cn: 我们这位，萨卡加维亚，她信仰祖先之灵，阿提拉也有他膜拜的牧羊神，对吗？

15.en: Oh, lord, we thank you for this meal and all of your bounty. And we pray that you help Sheldon get back on his rocker.
15.cn: 主啊，感谢您赐予我们晚餐，及您所有的恩赐，我们祈求您帮助谢尔顿重新振作。

16.en: And what is that, pray? I believe in love. I mean, brilliant careers, rich lives, are seldom led without just an element of love.
16.cn: 那是什么？我相信爱，优异的事业，富足的生活，很少能独立存在，总得有那么点爱。

17.en: People come here every day to make offering incense sticks and pray. But on New Year's Eve, it is a particularly important day to come and to ask for health and good fortune for the coming year.
17.cn: 每天都有人来这里，来烧香祈愿，但在除夕夜，在这尤为重要的一天中，必须到此祈求来年的安康鸿运。
